translation.zh: ‎每个人 ‎都有自己的人生旅程要走

translation.en: -[woman] Aww, life is good. -[Nancy] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-挺不错的
‎-是

translation.en: -Happy birthday, all of us. -[man] Whoo!
translation.zh: ‎生日快乐 祝大家所有人

translation.en: -[Nancy] I'm 82 and a half already. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: ‎我已经82岁半了

translation.en: [Nancy] I just lived my journey the best I could do each day.
translation.zh:
‎我负责走好自己的旅程
‎尽力过好自己的每一天

translation.en: We know about the pitfalls,
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道会碰上困难

translation.en: but one of the joys in life
translation.zh: ‎但人生的喜乐之一

translation.en: is about who we meet along the way.
translation.zh: ‎就是我们一路走来结识的那些人

translation.en: [woman] We're going to 6067 Wilshire Boulevard.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去威尔夏大道6067号

translation.en: We're on our way.
translation.zh: ‎我们在路上了

translation.en: Oh, this is the sweetest thing.
translation.zh: ‎噢 这简直是最贴心的事

translation.en: Where is our girl?
translation.zh: ‎咱的姑娘在哪儿呀？

translation.en: [in Italian] Oh, dear! How much I love you!
translation.zh: ‎天呐！我有多爱你！

translation.en: How are you?
translation.zh: ‎你好吗？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: ‎挺好的

translation.en: It feels like we know each other.
translation.zh: ‎感觉我们俩早就认识了似的

translation.en: We know each other very well.
translation.zh: ‎我们彼此很熟悉

translation.en: I really think so.
translation.zh: ‎我真这么觉得

translation.en: All the things that you've done, you represent us.
translation.zh: ‎你的那些成就啊 你代表了我们

translation.en: One hundred percent.
translation.zh: ‎百分之百

translation.en: I'm so happy to meet you. I'm really happy, truly.
translation.zh:
‎能认识你我真是太高兴了
‎我真的很高兴

translation.en: [woman in English] Thank you for coming here too. I have grown up…
translation.zh: ‎也感谢你的到来 我从小…

translation.en: [Sophia] To find this family…
translation.zh: ‎能找到这个家庭

translation.en: it was, for me, a kind of, uh… wonderful miracle.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 有点像是个美妙的奇迹

translation.en: [Sophia] She said that their family loved me a lot.
translation.zh: ‎她说她们家里的人都很爱我

translation.en: That each time the daughter was doing something,
translation.zh: ‎每当女儿要做什么事时

translation.en: the mother was always say,
translation.zh: ‎母亲总会说

translation.en: "Sophia is there. She's going to help you."
translation.zh: ‎“索菲亚来了 她会帮助你的”

translation.en: Like I was an image, which at that time,
translation.zh: ‎就好像我是一个形象 ‎在当时

translation.en: maybe it was something that she was looking for, -and she couldn't find. -[chattering]
translation.zh:
‎也许是她在找寻
‎但怎么也找不到的东西

translation.en: -[Sophia] It means something to people. -[glasses clink]
translation.zh: ‎这对人们来说有意义

translation.en: I think it's wonderful.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这很美妙

translation.en: [Nancy] No one gets everything they want in life.
translation.zh:
‎在人生中
‎没人能得到自己想要的一切

translation.en: No one does.
translation.zh: ‎没有人能够

translation.en: But we all get enough to feel
translation.zh: ‎但我们得到的足够多 能让我们觉得

translation.en: that our lives are important.
translation.zh: ‎我们的人生是重要的

translation.en: -I get good advice from Sophia. -[Sophia] I'm a good teacher.
translation.zh:
‎-我从索菲亚那里听了不少好建议
‎-我是个好老师

translation.en: You're a very good teacher.
translation.zh: ‎你是个非常好的老师

translation.en: -I come in whenever it's necessary. -That's right.
translation.zh: ‎每当有需要 我总会来到 ‎没错

translation.en: Don't you love it?
translation.zh: ‎你能不爱吗？
